title: InternX
description: InternX is an innovative platform designed to simplify the process of finding the ideal internship in the rapidly changing IT industry. The platform aims to bridge the gap between students and companies by providing a seamless and efficient approach to internship discovery and securement.

title: Explore Express
description: A web application that streamlines travel itinerary planning and tourism services that offers personalized travel itineraries, interactive maps, currency converter, and real-time weather forecasting.

title: Lecture Hall Allocation System
description: A system to optimize lecture hall scheduling by assigning halls based on course requirements, student capacity, and availability. This system reduces conflicts and improves management, offering scalability and ease of use for university administrators.
